title: Crime and Punishment 罪与罚（I）（英文版）
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky
intro: The poverty-stricken Raskolnikov, believing he is exempt from moral law, murders a man only to face the consequences not only from society but from his conscience, in this seminal story of justice, morality, and redemption from one of Russia's greatest novelists.The novel is compelling and rewarding, full of meaning and symbolism, and raises profound questions about the individual and society, and the nature of free will.
publisher: 北京明天远航文化传播有限公司
